website_summaries.verdict: Quiet, low cost belt-drive opener – if you get a good one. Unfortunately, reliability can be an issue.
pros: Great feature set includes soft-start and stop DC motor, 2 remotes, and Safe-T-Beams
cons: Fault reports are more frequent than we like to see

customer_reviews.title: You'd be crazy to buy this series of openers
customer_reviews.text: I've installed at least 200 Genie openers over a 40 year career building homes. Usually I recommend Genie until this series was brought out. In short, the problem is with the main control board. The last unit I installed in September has gone through (3) main boards. The opener is on a dedicated circuit and the garage door is perfectly balanced. Genie did give us new boards for free except for the shipping which we had to pick up. Completely unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: 44yrs a builder

customer_reviews.title: Genie Brand Not What It Used To Be
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this brand because it was what we had in the house for over 25 years. We paid a garage door company to professionally install it and it worked great for 1 week. The garage door company came back out and fixed it once for free and and now it is down again... I understand it is not the most expensive garage door opener but the bar/ rail keeps bending and causing the door to not operate correctly do to the metal being weak... I do not know how to proceed because I have paid to have it installed plus now to repair for a 2nd time in 3 weeks.... This is awful from a name brand company.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install, but doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Install was easy, opened the door with no issues, but after a dozen opens the track for the belt drive bent and caused the door not to open, even manually. No repair companies I have reached out to will touch Genie brand as they say they are cheaply made and not worth repairing.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ercoline

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn"t buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Works OK, not great. It is quiet. Lifts my double-car 8-foot door with no problems, but requires extension kit. Comes with an exterior keypad opener, which is nice. My primary complaint is that the receiver is not reliable from short range. I can open the door from a long distance using the homelink in my car. But, when backing out of the garage, I need to be at just the right angle and distance, or the door will not close. Infuriating.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Cap Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best garage door opener
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best opener I have purchased. The light automatically lights when you enter the garage, a nice touch. Very quiet, installed in less than 30 minutes and wiring is a piece of cake. With the included outside opener I no longer need to carry all my keys as I can enter and lock the garage with my own selected private code. Great price, beats everyone hands down. You will not be regret this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: So quiet you won’t believe it.
customer_reviews.text: This dc motor is so quite, it opens quieter than I can do by myself. Install good nylon rollers along with this to get the ultimate reduction in sound. On installation make sure the belt connector is near the middle of the track. I have a 8am door so I needed the extension, it fits at the door wall side. Also, very important, DO NOT use the wall switch to start the motor first time. You must use the buttons on the motor to set up door open and shut movement limits! This must be done first.

customer_reviews.title: Genie garage door opener

product_meta.title: Genie SilentMax 1200 Model 4042-TKH Garage Door Opener with Motion Detection Lighting, Ultra-Quiet Steel-Reinforced Belt Drive, 140V DC Motor, 3/4 + HPc 140V Belt Drive, Gray
product_meta.description: Style:SilentMax 1200The Genie SilentMax 1200 garage door opener is the perfect option if your garage is attached to your home. This model comes with a 140V DC motor that is lighter in weight and provides ultra-quiet and smooth operation, so that your family will not be disturbed by a noisy garage door opener. The soft start and stop feature of the motor offers smooth garage door travel, an improvement over AC motors. It’s powerful enough for almost any residential garage door, up to 7 feet in height (or 8 feet with an extension kit sold separately). The SilentMax offers increased opening speeds, up to 9 inches per second, yet still has safety features for your peace of mind. The Safe-T-Beam system helps prevent accidents via an invisible infrared beam across the door opening, which reverses the door if an object crosses the beam of LED light. The beams are enhanced with diagnostic technology to alert you if a malfunction occurs. Even the lighting system in the SilentMax is geared toward your safety: the 2 Bulb Bright Lighting System has space for 2 100-watt bulbs (not included) and an innovative power head design that places the lighting toward the back of the garage where you need it most. The SilentMax also features a built in motion detector that will automatically turn the overhead lights on for added convenience and security! Equipped with Intellicode Security technology, the SilentMax 1200 provides extra safety by preventing unauthorized access to your garage. Intellicode is a rolling code technology that automatically changes the access code on each door activation. The opener is fast and easy to install, with a premium reinforced low profile c-channel rail that presents a clean design to help protect against dirt and debris buildup. Flush-mounting capability allows for low headroom applications and requires no additional hardware for assembly. The Genie SilentMax 1200 comes with a Limited Lifetime Motor and Gearbox Warranty, and accessories include two pre-programmed 3-button remotes, a Wireless Keyless Keypad and a Multi-Function Wall Console (Control Panel) with vacation lock and light control button. Genie’s SmartSet programming makes setup for the opener fast and easy, with the simple push of a button. Due to California Senate Bill No. 969, as of 01 July 2019 all garage door openers, sold to or installed at any residence in California, must have a battery backup system included. Please search for Genie battery backup to find one that is in compliance with this law.
feature_bullets: ULTRA-QUIET OPERATION: The SilentMax 1200 is an ideal garage door opener for garages attached to living spaces.
POWERFUL AND SMOOTH OPERATION: The powerful 140V DC motor features a soft start and stop control for smooth door travel.
FAST AND EASY INSTALLATION: With no additional hardware required for assembly, the c-channel rail makes for faster, easier installation.
DURABLE AND RELIABLE: The steel-reinforced belt drive system adds strength, durability and value to the SilentMax 1200.
SAFE AND SECURE: The Self Diagnostic Safe-T-Beam system helps prevent accidents and Intellicode Security technology helps prevent unauthorized access.
